snippet.title: MotoGP™15 - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
[The game is out from today. The effective availability can be different country by country]

The amazing MotoGP™15 is now available for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®3 with new great features:

- Private Team
- GP Credits
- Customization 
- New game mode: Beat the Time 
- Real Events 2014

You could create your own rider (name, face and principal physical characteristics) and start racing as a Wild Card, so you'll be able to negotiate your future career by choosing one of the official teams participating in the 2015 championship, or choosing sponsors to race with your own Private Team. The aim is always the same: Win the World Champion Title!

To be the best, you can earn GP Credits, you can customize your bike, rider and team with more than 100 accessories and, finally, you could live your Top Rider experience with the new game mode that offers the chance to relive more than 50 events selected* from the most challenging moments in the last season. 

MotoGP™15: Live your Experience Now!

Visit the site www.motogpvideogame.com to have more info!

*18 Real Events are included in the DLC MotoGP™15 4-Stroke Champions and Events. DLC is free for those who have pre-ordered the game and remains purchasable into the digital store.
